description: This file defines a JPA entity class 'FundTransferEntity' representing a fund transfer record in a financial application. It includes fields for transaction details, status, and metadata, and uses annotations for ORM mapping.

classes.name: FundTransferEntity
classes.description: A JPA entity representing a fund transfer record with fields for IDs, account details, amount, and transfer status. It extends AuditAware for audit metadata.

methods.name: getTransactionReference
methods.description: Getter for the transaction reference string.

methods.name: setTransactionReference
methods.description: Setter for the transaction reference string.

methods.name: getFromAccount
methods.description: Getter for the source account string.

methods.name: setFromAccount
methods.description: Setter for the source account string.

methods.name: getToAccount
methods.description: Getter for the destination account string.

methods.name: setToAccount
methods.description: Setter for the destination account string.
